meanings.sent1: The room was so dark, it was the darkest place I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The night sky was at its darkest when the moon was hidden behind the clouds.
meanings.sent3: I tried to find my socks in the darkest corner of the drawer, but it was impossible!
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as dark as the darkest storm cloud on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The cave was so dark that it felt like stepping into the darkest depths of the ocean.

meanings.definition: Most intense or extreme in a particular quality or state
meanings.sent1: His anger reached its darkest point when he found out about the betrayal.
meanings.sent2: The villain's heart was the darkest of all, filled with malice and hatred.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate cake was so rich and sweet, it was like diving into the darkest dessert ever.
meanings.sent4: The forest's silence was the darkest before the dawn, holding its breath for the first light.
meanings.sent5: The secret she kept hidden was the darkest of all, buried deep within her heart.
